'''''The Canine General's Special Operations''''' is the first act of [[Gorou]]'s [[Hangout Event]].

In order to unlock this quest line, the player needs 2 [[Story Key]]s, must have reached [[Adventure Rank]] 30, and completed the {{Quest|Omnipresence Over Mortals}}, and {{Quest|Warriors' Dreams Like Spring Grass Renewing}}.
